briefTitle: Evaluation of Intraoperative Usage of Sentinella in Detecting Sentinel Lymph Nodes
officialTitle: Evaluation of Intraoperative Usage of Sentinella in Detecting Sentinel Lymph Nodes
conditions: Melanoma, Head and Neck Cancer, Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The percentage of patients for whom Sentinella detects additional tumor-positive SLNs.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* All melanoma patients, with a Breslow thickness \>1mm, who are seen at CPMC for sentinel node biopsy will be eligible to participate in this study provided that they have given consent.
